com.cloudcraftgaming.novagameslib.mechanics

Class CustomDayNightCycle

extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 11/19/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: NovaGamesLib-Bukkit

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CustomDayNightCycle getInstance()

      • startCustomDayLightCycle

        public void startCustomDayLightCycle(int id,
                            java.lang.Long timeOverride)
        Starts the custom day light cycle for the specified arena. Only call this once (at the start of the game)!!! Once called, NovaGames will handle the rest! !!!! DO NOT USE IF MORE THAN ONE (1) ARENA IS IN THE SAME WORLD !!!!
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        timeOverride - The Bukkit time to set the world to (in ticks). If null, will set to 12000.

      • updateTimeToCustomTime

        public void updateTimeToCustomTime(int id,
                          org.bukkit.World world)
        Sets the specified arena's world to the right time. DO NOT CALL THIS!!!NovaGames will handle this!!!!
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        world - The world of the arena.

      • getCustomTicksPerSecond

        public java.lang.Integer getCustomTicksPerSecond(int id)
        Gets the ticks per second a world should have based on the custom arena Day/Night Cycle. This will calculate this for you so you do not have to figure out the maths for this.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        Returns:
        The number of ticks there should be in a second for the arena.
